import React, {useState} from 'react' import '../index.css'; import '../App.css'; import Navbar from '../Navbar/Navbar'; import axios from 'axios'; function Inscription() { const url ="http://localhost:3000/users" const [data, setData] = useState({ title:"", description:"", name:"", image:"", idUser:"", adresse:"", }); function submit(e){ e.preventDefault(); axios.post(url,{ title: data.title, description: data.description, name: data.name, image: data.image, adresse: data.adresse, idUser: parseInt(data.idUser), }) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) }) } function handle(e){ const newdata={...data} newdata[e.target.id] = e.target.value setData(newdata) console.log(newdata) }; return (
